title_sort: louisa van velsor whitman to walt whitman, [30 november–3 december 1868]
title: Louisa Van Velsor Whitman to Walt Whitman, [30 November–3 December 1868]
text: about 1 Dec '68My dear walterWalteri have just got your letter with the order and am much Obliged and it comes very acceptable indeed i haventhaven't time to write much walterWalter dear this time as i send a letter from heydeHeyde and hannaHannah poor han she must have suffered much with pain and nerviousnessnervousness i wish i could be with her but it is impossible at present as i have my heart and hands full) i hardly think they will come to washingtonWashington if they doodo they will send you word beforehand mattyMatty is gaining slowly but it affects her when the wind changes to eastno more this time walterWalter dear Louisa Van Velsor Whitman to Walt Whitman, [30 November–3 December 1868]
